column2: I would like it clear though, since we're talking about polls, I beat Hillary Clinton by more than 11 points, and the reason it happens...
column4: In headtohead polls for the general election, "I beat Hillary Clinton by more than anybody, by 11 points."

column2: This guy has a number one  the number one absentee record in the United States...

column2: Donald Trump has written checks to Hillary Clinton not once, not twice, not three times.
column4: Says Donald Trump has written 10 checks to Hillary Clinton "and four of those checks were not to her Senate campaign.  It was to her presidential campaign."
Says Donald Trump has written 10 checks to Hillary Clinton "and four of those checks were not to her Senate campaign.  It was to her presidential campaign."

column2: Well, look, you know, when a family flies into the World Trade Center, a man flies into the World Trade Center, and his family gets sent back to where they were going  and I think most of you know where they went  and, by the way, it wasn't Iraq  but they went back to a certain territory, they knew what was happening.
column4: The 911 terrorists'friends, family, girlfriends in the United States"were sent back for the most part to Saudi Arabia. They knew what was going on. They went home, and they wanted to watch their boyfriends on television."

column2: Well, look, you know, when a family flies into the World Trade Center, a man flies into the World Trade Center, and his family gets sent back to where they were going  and I think most of you know where they went  and, by the way, it wasn't Iraq  but they went back to a certain territory, they knew what was happening.
column4: The wives of the 911 hijackers "knew exactly what was happening" and went back to Saudi Arabia two days before the attacks to watch their husbands on television flying the planes.
